title: The Zombie, the Cat and Barack Obama
description: If you ever wondered about the ancestry of Barack Obama, how Osama Bin Laden really died, the secret of Area 51, or the origins of the Illuminati, read this book and then wonder no more.The answers to all these questions are revealed here by Professor Christopher Antony Meade, (President of the Ancient Society of Secret Historians).Few books you read will be so enlightening or amusing.It’s not so much “the truth is out there” as “the truth is in here”.
author: Christopher Antony Meade
